H0.text: To make it easy to carry is the main advantage of making a laptop computer light in weight.

H1.text: To keep it simple to build is the main advantage of making a laptop computer light in weight.

H2.text: To make the screen easy to read is the main advantage of making a laptop computer light in weight.

H3.text: To provide storage for an electrical cord is the main advantage of making a laptop computer light in weight.

A4.text: The Osborne 1 was advertised as the only computer that would fit underneath an airline seat.
